lines.text: I must take you into my confidence and warn you. There is a curse which says that all persons present at the opening of a Pharaoh's coffin and who gaze at the face of the mummy therein, shall die. You have been WARNED!
You ever learn to do that to ragtime, give me a call... we'll make a fortune!
We're all doomed to die for this act of desecration.
